text:
@RandPaul TRUMPS PANDEMIC VIRUS RESPONSE

If his children were school aged,  would he have sent them to SCHOOL with NO COVID19 GUIDELINE in place?

He is happy to send our children to their possible DEATH with this statement. The risk is to high. 
SHAME ON HIM

STAY SAFE, STAY WELL https://t.co/LzLsnGm59Y
